sqlReaderQuery.value:
@concat('SELECT [Video_id]
      ,[playlist_id]
      ,cast([Video_Name] as nvarchar(10)) as Video_name
      ,[Video_published_date]
      ,[Video_views_count]
      ,[Video_like_count]
      ,[Video_favorite_count]
      ,[Video_comment_count]
      ,[Video_duartion]
      ,[Video_thumbnail]
      ,[Video_caption_status]
  FROM [Project].[dbo].[Video] where playlist_id=','''',item().playlist_id,'''')

scriptLines: address as (city as string, postalCode as integer, state as string, streetAddress as short),
phoneNumbers as (number as long, type as string)[]
